column4: I am trying to run the lkl keylogger but it does not accept any keymap file, I always get: unable to find UPPER case keymap file, check it!
does anyone know another keylogger? I need it to find out which command a function key issues
oh, thanks – that’s what I needed but it does not log this specific function key (it does log volume up / down etc. though)
it is a function to switch off the backlight LED of the power button. Do you know anything that could help?
